text: "Outside" is a 1998 song by George Michael and is the leading single from his greatest hits album Ladies & Gentlemen: The Best of George Michael. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in Spain, Hungary and Greece, number 3 in Scotland and Italy, number 4 in Denmark, number 5 in Iceland, number 14 in the Netherlands, number 10 in Norway, number 7 in Ireland, number 8 in Finland, number 13 in Australia, number 17 in Austria, number 26 in France, number 11 in New Zealand and number 30 in Germany. ==Track listings== * UK and Australian CD single; UK cassette single # "Outside" – 4:45 # "Fantasy 98" – 4:30 # "Outside" (Jon Douglas remix) – 8:04 * UK and Australian CD single (The Mixes) # "Outside" (Garage mix) – 7:40 # "Outside" (House mix) – 6:59 # "Outside" (K-Gee's cut) – 5:18 * UK 12-inch single # "Outside" (original version) – 4:45 # "Outside" (Garage mix) – 7:40 # "Outside" (House mix) – 6:59 # "Outside" (K-Gee's cut) – 5:18 * European CD single # "Outside" – 4:45 # "Fantasy 98" – 4:30 * Japanese CD single # "Outside" # "Fantasy 98" # "Outside" (Jon Douglas remix) # "Outside" (Garage mix) # "Outside" (House mix) # "Outside" (K-Gee's cut) ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Dance- pop songs Category:Funk songs Category:LGBT songs Category:George Michael songs
title: Outside (George Michael song)
